ads.btnSendClicked: Cool, we will response you back soon!
ads.jobDescription: Workers are needed at the cardboard factory (quality control, packaging, packaging). An 8-hour working day in 2 shifts. We draw up all the necessary documents, the vacancy is official. We provide accommodation, good conditions (no more than 2 people in a room). The city of Haifa. Only for Israeli citizens.

about.aboutCompany:
The Aviel Group of Companies is a large company in the region engaged in the organization and control of employee recruitment.
Qualified specialists of the company monitor every request at all stages - from resume to job placement.
Our company's services include not only job search, but also assistance with documents, provision of temporary housing and advice on job legalization. We strive to facilitate the process of employment and adaptation of our clients by providing a full range of services.
We understand that the adaptation process can be difficult and confusing. Our team of experts is ready to help you every step of the way, providing professional support and solving all your questions.

weOffer.oneText: Analyzing the labor market and selecting vacancies that match your skills and work experience.
weOffer.twoTextOne: Registration of the necessary documents for work and residence.
weOffer.twoTextTwo: Preparation and support of the process of obtaining a visa and work permit.
weOffer.twoTextThree: Consultations on the legal aspects of employment and job legalization.
weOffer.threeText: Search and rent temporary housing for the period of adaptation.
weOffer.fourText: Training in the company maintains a high level of qualification of employees and improves the quality of work.
weOffer.fiveText: Official employment and work under an employment contract. Social guarantees and a white salary.
weOffer.sixText: Flexible work schedule makes it possible to manage your time more efficiently and is suitable for students.
weOffer.sevenText: Additional wellness programs in medical institutions with an increased level of comfort.

howitWorks.oneText: Fill out the feedback form on the website.
howitWorks.twoText: Have a short interview with the manager.
howitWorks.threeText: It may be necessary to complete the test task proposed by the company.
howitWorks.fourText: Get to work after completing the test task successfully.

questions.one: I have responded to the vacancy, what are the next steps?
questions.oneText: Have a short interview with the manager. It may be necessary to complete the test task proposed by the company.
questions.two: Are you considering resumes from citizens of other countries?
questions.twoText: Have a short interview with the manager. It may be necessary to complete the test task proposed by the company.
questions.three: Is there any help for nonresidents when moving?
questions.threeText: Yes, we have a relocation program in place.
